summary.en: From liturgical dress to altar ornamentation to sermon manuscripts; explore the rich collections at the University of Notre Dame used in religious ceremonies and inspired by world religions.

value.en: Gilt polychrome wood, cloth and leather

Commemorative Book of Rev Sorin Golden Jubilee

Commemorative Book of Rev. Edward Sorin's Golden Jubilee from Saint St Mary's of the Holy Rosary, Woodland, California, 1888.  Page featuring a drawing by Notre Dame Professor Luigi Gregori of the Virgin Mary and Jesus as a child handing a rosary to Saint Dominic.

en: Cross Near Site of Old Log Chapel
A cross on the site of the first log chapel, with a man sitting on the hill over looking St. Mary's Lake, 1894.

en: Rare Books and Special Collections, Hesburgh Libraries, University of Notre Dame.
A journal of sermon notes compiled by the Puritan divine Nathaniel Rogers (1598-1655), before and after his emigration from England to Massachusetts in 1636.
Old St. Patrick's Church (Chicago, Illinois) Sunday Mass advertisement artwork, c1910s..Artwork by Thomas A. O'Shaughnessy.
